title: Traditional Fiji Private Island Paradise with World-Class Snorkelling & Diving
description: Escape to the ultimate private island paradise at Nakelo Treasure Island Resort Fiji, one of the country's most iconic family-friendly retreats. From your private, modern bure, breathtaking natural beauty, pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters await - explore the island's surrounding coral reef, brimming with technicolour marine life, unwind with a soothing treatment at Senikai Spa or savour fiery spectacles at the resort's teppanyaki house, Matasawa Teppanyaki.
offer_address: Nakelo Treasure Island, Lautoka, Mamanuca Islands, Fiji
